title: Ratification of POS Working Group Charter V.05
body:
We propose an amendment to the POS Working Group Charter which would formalize the use of snapshot as the binding decision-making mechanism for the Proof of Stake Working Group of the European Blockchain Association. 

The details of the proposed charter can be found on the EBA github at the following link.

https://github.com/European-Blockchain-Association/DSAO/raw/master/Governance/EUPOS/Proof%20of%20Stake%20Working%20Group%20Charter%20V%200.5.pdf
author: 0xf40Cf2fbE0838c007CD34f2a6957bfE110BfC928
